name: passenger
desc: Server for Ruby, Python, and Node.js apps via Apache/NGINX
caveats:
To activate Phusion Passenger for Nginx, run:
  brew install nginx
And add the following to /home/travis/Homebrew/etc/nginx/nginx.conf at the top scope (outside http{}):
  load_module /home/travis/Homebrew/opt/passenger/libexec/buildout/nginx_dynamic/ngx_http_passenger_module.so;
And add the following to /home/travis/Homebrew/etc/nginx/nginx.conf in the http scope:
  passenger_root /home/travis/Homebrew/opt/passenger/libexec/src/ruby_supportlib/phusion_passenger/locations.ini;
  passenger_ruby /usr/bin/ruby;

To activate Phusion Passenger for Apache, create /etc/apache2/other/passenger.conf:
  LoadModule passenger_module /home/travis/Homebrew/opt/passenger/libexec/buildout/apache2/mod_passenger.so
  PassengerRoot /home/travis/Homebrew/opt/passenger/libexec/src/ruby_supportlib/phusion_passenger/locations.ini
  PassengerDefaultRuby /usr/bin/ruby
